JOB DESCRIPTION:
AUM Insurance Brokers Pvt. Ltd. Is expanding and soon coming up with our own online portal (takeapolicy) for the sale of insurance products of various companies ,  where the end user (Customer) shall be able to log into portal to 

buy insurance products online. The customer will be able to view comparison of productsand select the company as per his own requirement for the purchase of the insurance product online 

Requirements 

Relevant experience of 2 to 5 years Strong object oriented programming and design skills.
